name: JBL C100SI Wired In Ear Headphones with Mic, JBL Pure Bass Sound, One Button Multi-function Remote, Angled Buds for Comfort fit (Black)

reviews.title: My first experience with JBL earphone.
reviews.text: The product is very nice and it's designed build very attractive, these things I like it. JBL earphone is nice bass .

reviews.title: Good product
reviews.text: Good sound quality and works well with Teams call

reviews.title: decent
reviews.text: purchased for husband as i dont like this style of headphones as it hurts my ears. he says its quite decent, purchased it during offer time

reviews.title: Good audio quality, value for money
reviews.text: Good audio quality. Built quality could have been better. Should have provided volume controls.Overall a good product for the price.

reviews.title: Sound
reviews.text: It provides best sound quality but base is so lite

reviews.title: Good Headphone
reviews.text: Good headphone. If we can volume control in the same price range...it would have being nice.

reviews.title: Decent sound quality, sturdy cables and reasonable price
reviews.text: The sound quality of these earphones is excellent, and I find that they deliver a great balance of instrumental separation and clarity. The bass and treble are well-tuned and provide an immersive experience when listening to music or watching movies.The microphone quality is also impressive, as I have used it for several conference calls and it has delivered clear and distortion-free audio. The microphone's positioning is also great as it efficiently filters unwanted noise, allowing me to communicate effectively.

reviews.title: Overall pleasant experience
reviews.text: Good overall performance. Decent bass, vocals and highs. Loudness is not that much.

reviews.title: JBL
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 6 September 2018
reviews.text: Very good quality for the price . Good sound .

reviews.title: Excelente producto
reviews.text: Es un buen producto con excelente relacion precio, no son muy costosos, se escuchan bien, tienen buen aislamientodel ruido externo, y son fabricados por Harmann Kardon, aunque sean JBL,o sea que es buen producto, si lo recomiendo. Ya tengo unas 4 semanas con ellos y no han fallado.

reviews.title: 2 meses y dejan de funcionar :C
reviews.text: Los comprÃ© buscando algo bÃ¡sico para teleconferencias, no caro, no barato, marca reconocida, funcional, duraderos.Todo iba bien, pero al segundo mes, se dejÃ³ de escuchar el auricular derecho. El uso es ocasional, comprÃ© un case para no jalarlos, los uso 1-2 veces al dÃ­as para reuniones, no viajo en transporte publico con ellos, creo que hasta los cuido.Que sea marca JBL no garantiza nada, por el resultado, mejor comprar algunos chinos Xiaomi por $110.

name: Crysendo 70mm Protein Leather Cushions | Replacement Headphone Ear Pads | 1.5cm Thick Replacement Headphone Ear Pads| Compatible with Phi-lips SHL 3000, shb5500, SHB 3060 Headphones Cushion | High-Quality Protein Leather & Memory Foam Earpad (Black)

reviews.title: Good Replacement for the original Ear Pads
reviews.date: Reviewed in India ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡³ on 6 March 2023
reviews.text: Bought these as a replacement for the original ear pads of a Philips SHB3060 Headphone. Replacement was fairly straight forward following the Video tutorials (link & a handy 'pry' tool are included in the packaging !)

reviews.title: Fits Phillips SHB-5500
reviews.date: Reviewed in India ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡³ on 5 March 2022
reviews.text: For anyone replacing pads for SHB-5500After removing the stock pad there will be a slight cutout in the headphones.Insert a part of the new pads in it and after that keep sliding the pad in the gap until the pad fits in perfectly.Talking about the Product Quality, It sure looks and feels premium.
